page.title: 16Entertainment in North Bucks
page.content: Although there are many clubs and activities in the village of Great Horwood,for other forms of entertainment a journey outside the village is required. There are cinemas at Buckingham, Bletchley and Aylesbury. Live Theatre can be found at Milton Keynes and Oxford, although there are number of local amateur dramatic societies. Circuses and funfairs visit local towns and villages and in August there is a fair on the village green in Great Horwood itself.This fair is really the village feast and has been established over the centuries. The lack of public transport means that a car is almost a necessity of life if villagers are to take advantage of the entertainment available.
